mosaic.ai.aboutUs.1: Mosaic.ai innovates with a pioneering SaaS platform in Brazil, transforming data into a living culture that drives growth and innovation. Even in our early stages, we are redefining strategic management, proving that a strong culture is synonymous with extraordinary results.
mosaic.ai.aboutUs.2: Our mission is clear: not just to accompany, but to be an engine for growth and innovation in organizations, integrating organizational culture as an essential strategic pillar to achieve superior results.
mosaic.ai.aboutUs.3: With Mosaic.ai, culture is not just part of the business; it is what drives the business.
mosaic.ai.findConnections: It's not just about innovating. It's about delivering value and solving problems.

mosaic.ai.valueProposition.title: Value Proposition
mosaic.ai.valueProposition.1: We stand out for our unique ability to transform data into strategic insights, redefining strategic management to be a living, dynamic practice that is intrinsically linked to the company's culture. The in-depth customization of our services, adapted to the specific needs of each client, and our ability to promote effective alignment between teams are the pillars that position us at the forefront of business intelligence in Brazil.
mosaic.ai.valueProposition.2: We are not just guiding, but transforming companies, preparing them to lead in a future where culture and data go hand in hand towards excellence. We are committed to ensuring that the platform is not just a tool, but a strategic partner for our clients, redefining what it means to be a successful company in the digital age.
mosaic.ai.boldDecisions: Bold decisions supported by data-driven insights
mosaic.ai.faq.1.question: What is Mosaic.ai?
mosaic.ai.faq.1.answer.content: Mosaic.ai is an innovative platform that integrates Social Network Analysis (SNA) and Competency Growth Model (CGM) to improve employee productivity, engagement, and skills development. We use artificial intelligence and data analysis to provide valuable insights and personalized solutions for companies.
mosaic.ai.faq.2.question: How can Mosaic.ai benefit my company?
mosaic.ai.faq.2.answer.content:
Mosaic.ai offers several benefits, including:

- Improved Engagement: Identifying influencers and information hubs to promote more effective communication.
- Skills Development: Mapping competencies and identifying gaps to create personalized training programs.
- Reduced Turnover: Predicting employee turnover and implementing preventive actions.
- Increased Productivity: Analyzing social networks to optimize collaboration and identify critical areas.
mosaic.ai.faq.3.question: What is Social Network Analysis (SNA) and how is it used in Mosaic.ai?
mosaic.ai.faq.3.answer.content:
Social Network Analysis (SNA) is a methodology that studies relationships and interactions between individuals within an organization. At Mosaic.ai, we use SNA to:

- Data Collection: Capture data from a survey (ONA active) and Capture data from emails, meetings, and collaboration tools.
- Network Metrics: Calculate centrality, density, and cohesion to identify influencers and silos.
- Visualization: Create interactive network maps and dashboards to monitor communication and collaboration.
mosaic.ai.faq.4.question: What is Competency Management (CGM) and how is it applied in Mosaic.ai?
mosaic.ai.faq.4.answer.content:
Competency Growth Model (CGM) involves identifying, mapping, and developing essential competencies for each role within the organization. At Mosaic.ai, we apply CGM to:

- Competency Mapping: Define and map competencies aligned with the company's strategic objectives.
- Gap Analysis: Identify skill gaps and areas for improvement.
- Training Programs: Develop personalized training programs based on identified competencies.
mosaic.ai.faq.5.question: What are the main features of the Mosaic.ai platform?
mosaic.ai.faq.5.answer.content:
The main features include:

- Network Mapping and Analysis (SNA)
- Competency Management (CGM)
- Data Visualization and Interactive Dashboards
- Personalized Training Programs
- Turnover Prediction
- Integration with Collaboration and E-learning Tools
mosaic.ai.faq.6.question: How does Mosaic.ai address emerging work trends?
mosaic.ai.faq.6.answer.content:
Mosaic.ai is aligned with key work trends, including:

- Flexible Benefits: Personalizing benefits based on employee preferences.
- Continuous Education: E-learning and Life Long Learning modules to promote continuous education.
- Balance of Soft and Tech Skills: Training programs that address both soft skills and tech skills.
- Sustainability: Sustainability training modules and promotion of practice communities focused on green skills.
- Salary Transparency: Features that promote salary transparency and equity.
mosaic.ai.faq.7.question: How can Mosaic.ai help reduce turnover in my company?
mosaic.ai.faq.7.answer.content: We use artificial intelligence to predict employee turnover, allowing your company to implement preventive actions. Additionally, we offer career development and training programs that address the causes of frustration and dissatisfaction, promoting a more satisfying work environment.
mosaic.ai.faq.8.question: Is Mosaic.ai suitable for companies of all sizes?
mosaic.ai.faq.8.answer.content: Yes, Mosaic.ai is scalable and can be adapted to meet the needs of companies of all sizes, from small startups to large corporations. Our platform is flexible and can be customized to align with each organization's strategic goals.
mosaic.ai.faq.9.question: How does Mosaic.ai ensure data security and privacy?
mosaic.ai.faq.9.answer.content: Data security and privacy are our priorities. We use best practices in information security, including data encryption, strict access controls, and compliance with data protection regulations such as GDPR and LGPD.
mosaic.ai.faq.10.question: How can I start using Mosaic.ai in my company?
mosaic.ai.faq.10.answer.content: To start using Mosaic.ai, contact us to schedule a personalized demo. Our team of experts will guide you through the platform's features and help define an implementation plan that meets your company's specific needs.

mosaic.ai.privacyPolicy.subtitle.1: This Privacy Policy describes how Mosaic.ai uses and protects the information you provide when you use this website. Mosaic.ai is committed to ensuring that your privacy is protected. Should we ask you to provide certain information by which you can be identified when using this website, then you can be assured that it will only be used in accordance with this privacy statement.
mosaic.ai.privacyPolicy.subtitle.2: Mosaic.ai may change its policy from time to time by updating this page. You should check this page periodically to ensure that you are happy with any changes.
mosaic.ai.privacyPolicy.informationColle: We may collect the following information:
Other information relevant to market research and/or promotional offers.
What we do with the information we collect
We are committed to ensuring that your information is secure. All information provided will be used exclusively by Mosaic.ai for the following purposes:
Periodically send promotional emails about new products, special offers or other information which we think you may find interesting, using the email address provided.
Get in touch for market research purposes. We can contact you by email, telephone, fax or post. We may use the information to customize the website according to your interests.
mosaic.ai.termsAndConditions.subtitle.1: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using our website.
mosaic.ai.termsAndConditions.subtitle.2: By accessing or using the website, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you disagree with any part of the terms and conditions, you may not access the website.
mosaic.ai.termsAndConditions.personalInf: When you use our website, you may be asked to provide certain personal information that can be used to contact or identify you. We may use this information for marketing and personalized communications purposes.
mosaic.ai.termsAndConditions.dataUsage.s: Any personal information provided to us will be used exclusively by Mosaic.ai for marketing and personalized communications purposes. We will not share this data with third parties without your consent.
mosaic.ai.termsAndConditions.changes.sub: We reserve the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time. By continuing to use the website after changes are posted, you accept the changes.
